name: Kråmening (WIP)
description:
Made for HollandaiseSpirit! Merry Christmas buddy!

WASD / Arrow keys - Walk
Mouse - Look
Spacebar - Jump
Escape - Pause

Currently a work in progress. Features to be added:

  • Bushes & Grass
  • Weather cycle
  • Day/night cycle
  • Animals
  • Rivers
  • Possibly actual gameplay and an ending

The music used is violin improvisations by me:

https://89odev.bandcamp.com/album/isochronica
